title: How to write (a rap) over a beat - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey, i made an app specially for that: Rap Recorder HD - Apps on Google Play You can import a mp3 beat and record your rap on it. It has live output, so if your mobile phone has low latency audio, you can even make a live performance with speakers. Just give it a try and if you have any further questions, just ask. It has couple effects too, in case you want to edit your rap vocal. Hope you like it.

How do you think? just go do it. Find a good rap beat that gets something out of you or make one. Listen to it and start freestyling then use that direction to write to and go from there. If you dont know how to rap my best suggestion is start freestyling everyday and rhyming words as much as you can everyday. Use rappads decent freestyle app: Freestyle
